description:
Keima and Elsie head to a game store in a neighboring town to buy a certain game.
However, there is a very enticing fair at a different store... Keima dispatches Elsie to obtain the game in his stead. Will she succeed... ("Her First Errand") Haqua shows up because she needs to write a report about the loose soul which was secured a while back.  It appears that she wants help writing the report... ("Tea for Three.")
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hajimete no Otsukai / 3 Nin de Ocha o.
Her First Errand / Tea for Three
Ma première commission / Tous les trois au café
はじめての☆おつかい / 3人でお茶を.
